step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your arm overhead. Try to straighten your arm a bit more and feel that gentle resistance.
Your arm was mostly overhead. Focus on a full stretch and feeling the resistance throughout the movement.
You opened your hand well. For the next reps, really focus on making a tight fist and squeezing your muscles as you inhale.
You opened your hand nicely. Try to relax your muscles more fully as you exhale to maximize the pumping action.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with the overhead arm movements! Remember to stretch your arm fully overhead and make a tight fist when you breathe in. Then, relax your hand and muscles as you breathe out.
